website_summaries.verdict: Australia’s Globe International brand has produced yet another winner in the form of Dart LYTs. These kicks feature a lightweight and comfy appeal that’s much like wearing nothing but socks on your feet. The shoes mold to the feet to provide a snug fit, and the bottoms are very flexible so that every stride is a pleasure.The soles are very grippy and will provide you a stable footing on many types of surfaces. And for all the value these shoes afford, they’re quite the opposite of expensive.
pros: Globe Dart LYT shoes are as comfortable as putting on socks, many users say
The sneakers are lightweight and, when worn, feel like you’ve got nothing on your feet, some people have reported
Several purchasers like the form-fitting feel and fit of these kicks from the Australian brand, Globe
The grip on these shoes is exceptional, a good number of testers claim, which makes them excellent for skateboarding to kitchen work
According to some individuals, the design of Globe Dart LYT skateboarding shoes is unique and outstanding
A few customers have mentioned that the shoes flex “awesomely.”
Some reviews of Globe Dart LYT sneakers state that these offer ample arch support
The shoes feel like they will hold up for a long time when used solely for casual wear, two persons have noted
According to a few reviews, the price of Globe Dart LYTs is very affordable
cons: Several people have reported that Globe Dart LYT run short by about a half size
These kicks do not contain enough cushioning on the bottom, some say
A handful of testers feel that Dart LYTs may be suitable for casual use but not for skateboarding because they’re too thin

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: What a great shoe. Honestly it resembles the Nike Roshe one but half the cost, and just as comfortable. If your questioning this, just get it. Your feet feel amazing once out of them as if you walked barefoot all day. I have issues with heavier shoes tending to make my ankles hurt and these help sooo much. They do fit alittle big, if you have narrow feet go a half size down.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy!! Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is his wife, he absolutely LOVES these. He’s said it probably 10xs lol! He is always on his feet for 8 hours at work a day. So he needed good arch support. Funny thing is, last month we paid $70 at shoe carnival for some Nikes.. which don’t even have enough support and they’re flimsy material. These shoes however are $30, and sturdy, perfect fit, and have plenty of support!! Very worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Deezy Marie

customer_reviews.title: He thinks they are very comfortable and he is happy with them
customer_reviews.text: Keep in mind these were purchased for a teenager. He is very hard on his shoes. Due to these being of a material and not leather I know these will not last 6 months. That is not the shoes fault!! Again--teenage boy. They are extremely lightweight. He thinks they are very comfortable and he is happy with them. If they were cheaper I would buy more. These were purchased because they were a gift of his choice.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I ordered a 1/2 size larger as recommended by other customers
customer_reviews.text: Received the shoes tried them on and the right shoe was small. I ordered a 1/2 size larger as recommended by other customers. The left shoe fit fine. You could see by just looking at the shoes that they were different sizes. I checked the size label on the inside of the right shoe and noticed a size label was placed over the original label. The original label was a size 10 the fake label was an 11. Didn’t appreciate that you were trying to get over on me. Shoes were returned. Not cool!
customer_reviews.author: Frank M

customer_reviews.title: Solid shoe, good price.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for the Appleyard mahalo lyte which I had before but was unable to find them in my size again so I tried these. They fit as expected and are very light. They don’t seem quite as durable as the mahalo but so far they have held up well. The only negative I would say is that there’s not a ton of arch support but it’s certainly better than most skate style shoes. Can’t beat them for the price and they look pretty cool too so 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Westall

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe for the money.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I haven't worn it long enough to see if it holds up but i like he look of these shoes and they are light and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy LaDucer

customer_reviews.title: Great arch support, super light weight.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoes. Edge of sole is a little darker than the pictures which is nice since they don't seem as dirty compared to if they were whiter. Biggest surprise was the arch support to get rid over pronation. The shoe flexes awesomely and the bottoms (Nitrolite) seem like they'll hold up for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Great for walking not real sure how well they would skate
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes not greatest quality but for the price cant complain
customer_reviews.author: Joe Stilwell

customer_reviews.title: Super light and comfortable. A bit snug on the fit, though.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a size 14, which normally fits me well with a bit of room to spare. These fit like a sock; my toe goes almost to the end. Still comfortable and I wear them every day, but the size is a bit smaller than I'd like.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great grip. I had to add a innersole because i have feet problems. Otherwise if you do not have feet problems you should be okay.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel F.

customer_reviews.title: I love GLOBE!
customer_reviews.text: For me, the company (GLOBE) - was a discovery! I could not think that for a little money I will get premium quality goods. I washed sneakers in the washing machine more than 10 times - and they look like new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3rd pair and still stoked
customer_reviews.text: I see these comfy foam globes pop up from time to time for $30 and always nab a pair. This is pair number 3 and I'm still stoked! Right between comfort and form.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I wear this everyday at work as a line cook I haven't busted my ass yet so great grip👍 love the brand and products
customer_reviews.author: Seth G.

customer_reviews.title: Great show for the price
customer_reviews.text: Shoes purchased for casual use. They look great & fit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Desertracerdad

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and is very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My college son ordered these shoes and now my husband wants a pair! Looks great and is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Tayler

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lives up to the globe standard not the greatest insoles but extremely sleek very nice light weight as well
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Amatuzio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Normally wear a 9, had to reorder these in a 10
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am so disappointed I paid over $70 for this shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoes changed color after washing, they now have some visible white stains on them. The shoe is quite tight too. I am so disappointed I paid over $70 for this shoe. There are better shoes I could have bought for $70.
customer_reviews.author: Tenny

customer_reviews.title: Fit big and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: They’re rather uncomfortable. They fit big by about a whole size. Very high weird arches and very hard soles. Sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Ash Padgett

product_meta.title: Globe Men's Dart LYT Skateboarding Shoe
product_meta.description: Minimalist, microfiber outside, technical comfort details inside. Lifestyle casual with step in entry and lightweight sole.
feature_bullets: Nitrolite EVA outsole for light weight
